name: CloudDataBreach
description: A case template for handling cloud data breach incidents
author: DFIR-IRIS
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a cloud data breach

tasks.title: Identify affected data
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the breach by identifying affected data and systems

tasks.title: Assess breach impact
tasks.description: Evaluate the potential impact of the breach on organizational operations and assets

tasks.title: Secure compromised systems
tasks.description: Secure compromised systems by changing access controls, patching vulnerabilities, or other necessary steps

tasks.title: Notify affected parties
tasks.description: Notify affected parties about the breach, in accordance with legal and regulatory requirements

tasks.title: Implement security improvements
tasks.description: Implement and update security measures to prevent future data breaches

notes.title: Breach description
notes.content: Details of the data breach, including the time of occurrence, how it was discovered, and suspected causes

notes.title: Affected data
notes.content: List of affected data and systems

notes.title: Security measures
notes.content: Summary of the security measures implemented to prevent future data breaches
